resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104775</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104775</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202559</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Life's Percents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozente Des Lebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Pour cent de la Vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por cento Da Vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percento Della Vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Percents ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Por ciento De la Vida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will gather data from their own lives to use in calculating percents. They will measure parts of their bodies (head, leg, neck, etc.), complete a class survey that asks information about themselves, and use a pay stub to find percentages of deductions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erfassen Daten von ihren eigenen 
Lebensdauern, um in Rechenprozenten zu verwenden. Sie messen 
Teile ihrer Körper (Kopf, Bein, Ansatz, etc.), durchführen eine 
Kategorie Übersicht, die um um Informationen nach selbst bittet, und 
benutzen einen Bezahlung Stummel, um Prozentsätze von Abzügen zu 
finden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants recueilleront des données de leurs 
propres vies pour utiliser en pour cent calculateurs. Ils 
mesureront des parties de leurs corps (tête, jambe, cou, etc.), 
terminent une enquête de classe qui demande l'information sur 
eux-mêmes, et emploient un moignon de salaire pour trouver des 
pourcentages des déductions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes recolherão dados de suas próprias 
vidas para usar-se em por cento calculadores. Medirão partes de
seus corpos (cabeça, pé, garganta, etc.), terminam um exame da 
classe que peça a informação sobre se, e usam um topo do pagamento 
encontrar porcentagens das deduções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi riuniranno i dati dalle loro 
proprie vite per usare nei percento calcolatori. Misureranno le 
parti dei loro corpi (testa, piedino, collo, ecc.), completano 
un'indagine del codice categoria che interroga le informazioni 
riguardo se stesso ed usano un albero mozzo di paga per trovare le 
percentuali delle deduzioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα συγκεντρώσουν τα στοιχεία από τις 
ζωές τους που χρησιμοποιούν στον υπολογισμό percents. Θα 
μετρήσουν τα μέρη των οργανισμών τους (κεφάλι, πόδι, λαιμός, 
κ.λπ.), θα συμπληρώσουν μια έρευνα κλάσης που ρωτά τις 
πληροφορίες για τους, και χρησιμοποιούν ένα στέλεχος αμοιβής για 
να βρούν τα ποσοστά των αφαιρέσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes recopilarán datos a partir de sus 
propias vidas para utilizar en por ciento calculadores. Medirán
a partes de sus cuerpos (pista, pierna, cuello, etc.), terminan una 
encuesta sobre la clase que pida la información acerca de sí mismos,
y utilizan un trozo de la paga para encontrar porcentajes de 
deducciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KAREN MCPHERSON

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104775</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/lifes-percents</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
